
{{alias}}( len )
    Returns a zero-filled "generic" array.

    Parameters
    ----------
    len: integer
        Array length.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array
        Output array.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 3 )
    [ 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ]

    See Also
    --------
